com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.cluster.clustering

Class ClusterManagerPlugin<T extends ClusterItem>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.cluster.clustering.ClusterManagerPlugin<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.OnCameraIdleListener, com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.OnInfoWindowClickListener, com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.OnMarkerClickListener

    public class ClusterManagerPlugin<T extends ClusterItem>
extends Object
implements com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.OnCameraIdleListener, com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.OnMarkerClickListener, com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.OnInfoWindowClickListener
    Groups many items on a map based on zoom level.

    ClusterManagerPlugin should be added to the map as an:

    • MapboxMap.OnCameraIdleListener
    • MapboxMap.OnMarkerClickListener

    This is a port of https://github.com/googlemaps/android-maps-utils to use mapbox as the backend. for clustering functionality at the core level, please follow the work on https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-gl-native/issues/5814

      • setOnClusterClickListener

        public void setOnClusterClickListener(ClusterManagerPlugin.OnClusterClickListener<T> listener)
        Sets a callback that's invoked when a Cluster is tapped. Note: For this listener to function, the ClusterManagerPlugin must be added as a click listener to the map.

      • setOnClusterInfoWindowClickListener

        public void setOnClusterInfoWindowClickListener(ClusterManagerPlugin.OnClusterInfoWindowClickListener<T> listener)
        Sets a callback that's invoked when a Cluster is tapped. Note: For this listener to function, the ClusterManagerPlugin must be added as a info window click listener to the map.

      • setOnClusterItemClickListener

        public void setOnClusterItemClickListener(ClusterManagerPlugin.OnClusterItemClickListener<T> listener)
        Sets a callback that's invoked when an individual ClusterItem is tapped. Note: For this listener to function, the ClusterManagerPlugin must be added as a click listener to the map.

      • setOnClusterItemInfoWindowClickListener

        public void setOnClusterItemInfoWindowClickListener(ClusterManagerPlugin.OnClusterItemInfoWindowClickListener<T> listener)
        Sets a callback that's invoked when an individual ClusterItem's Info Window is tapped. Note: For this listener to function, the ClusterManagerPlugin must be added as a info window click listener to the map.
